name: Silent Service 2
description: The all-new Silent Service II A State Of The Art Simulation Of Submarines In World War II!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: Direct port of SS2 Runing in a DOS box. simple game mechanics and weak grafics (it from 1992 after all) but still a good game.
This game, in my opinion is great... The only problem is, I have no idea how to play it. The keychart that i found doesnt seem to work, so if anyone has any advice, plz help!
